outdoors.name: The Street
outdoors.text: You can see the subway station down the block. But are you sure you want to go home already? Why don't you pop into a random room instead?

buttons.text: I take it back. Teleport me!!
Let me get on that damn train >:(

basementStaircase.name: Creaky Staircase
basementStaircase.text: It's dark and dusty. The light from upstairs barely penetrates into the gloom.

buttons.text: Walk down
Go back upstairs

basementWorkshop.text: Stumbling through the dark (why didn't you turn on a light?), you walk face-first into a table saw. Looking around you, you can barely make out tools on the walls. You must be in an old workshop...

buttons.text: Power tools in the dark? What could go wrong!
This is a bad idea, I should go back upstairs.
Wait a minute, what was that sound?

basementInjury.text: Shit! You cut your finger. On second thought, maybe power tools in the dark was a bad idea.

buttons.text: Maybe the bathroom upstairs has a first-aid kit.

basementLost.text: Oh no! You seem to have lost your way in the dark.

buttons.text: Keep wandering
Cry for help!

basementStillLost.text: You wander around some more, but can't seem to find your way anywhere.

buttons.text: Keep wandering
Cry for help!

basementAbyss.text: You walk blindly, following the wall with your hand, until suddenly there is no more wall. You feel around you desperately -- but everything seems to have disappeared. It's pitch black, like you're in an abyss.

buttons.text: Scream for help!
Close your eyes and think happy thoughts.

basementHelp.text: You feel a hand on your shoulder and spin around -- but it's just your friend. "What are you doing down here? Come back upstairs to the party!"

buttons.text: Follow your friend

basementSound.text: You hear a shuffling of feet. Has someone come to help you get out of here? As the sound gets closer, you think you can start to make out a face...

buttons.text: Peer into the darkness
"Mom?"
Is that... YOUR face?
"Lin Manuel Miranda????"

basementMom.text: "Honey, you really shouldn't be hiding down in the basement on your own. Go have fun with your friends!"

buttons.text: Oh my GOD Mom what are you even DOING here FINE I'll go back to the party just GO HOME MOM GOD

basementMirror.text: Nevermind, that's not your clone -- you're just looking in the mirror. Wait a minute, this isn't the basement -- you've just been in the bathroom with the lights off this whole time!

buttons.text: Oh. You should probably go easier on the drugs.

basementLin.text: It is! It's 3-time-Tony-award-winning, Broadway-musical-composing, How-I-Met-Your-Mother-cameoing Lin Manuel Miranda! How are you going to impress him?

buttons.text: Try to rap Guns and Ships
Tell him how you were a fan even before Hamilton

basementPerformance.text: Lin Manuel Miranda isn't impressed. Actually, he doesn't seem to react much at all. Wait -- that's not Lin, you've just been rapping at a mannequin. Oh well. Maybe real people would appreciate your talents better.

buttons.text: Go perform in the back yard

basementPantry.text: Stumbling through the dark (why didn't you turn on a light?), you step on a mousetrap. OW! Wait a minute -- you're in the pantry! Boxes of food surround you. You are feeling kinda hungry...

buttons.text: Gorge on the food.
Don't be rude. There's food upstairs, anyway.
